name: comBALLnations
description:
On the edge of the universe there exists a world where the third dimension has not reached. Here, on planet Rombus circles rule. One circle grew too powerful, Comball, and all the other circles rose up against him. Each circle grabbing one of his infinite sides pulled as hard as they could and split Comball into an infinite number of himself. Comball is now on a mission to reclaim all of who he is and return to his whole

WASD or Left Joystick to move
SPACE or X (Dualshock) to jump

Combine the balls. Become Stronger Together.
